page.title: 11HEALTH KIRKBY MALZEARD AREA
page.content: Most fortunate in a rural area of this nature to have 2{doctors surgeries. One dispensing. Two resident doctors. Open surgeries each weekday.{District {Nurses, Midwives & Health visitors attend to needs of the sick, elderly, mothers & babies & any-one needing nursing care & advice.{Mobile Clinic visits villages monthly advising Mums of children up to school age. Normal{school health service. {Mobile chiropodist}lives locally visiting patients by request. {Chiropody clinic}organised by the Area Health Authority in villages every 3 months. {Ambulances}available for transporting patients to local hospitals for out-patient appointments.{Cottage hospital}5miles away for X-Rays, out-patient treatment minor operations & convalescence.
